description: Using caramelized onion, melted cheese, and pickled cucumber takes an everyday hot dog to another level.
name: Bacon, Onion & Cheese Hot Dogs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, spread a quarter of the caramelized red onions into each hot dog bun, top with a bacon and cheese sausage, and sprinkle 1 tbsp of the pickled cucumbers along the top.
